content: Malaysian actor **Muhammad Imam Shah Abdul Mutalib** (born 21 June 1988) is a [Malaysian](/wiki/Malaysians) actor born in Singapore. He is known for his action roles on Singaporean television channel [MediaCorp Suria](/wiki/MediaCorp_Suria). In Malaysia, he is known for his role as Shafiq in *Lafazkan Kalimah Cintamu* (2018). ## Early life Imam was born on 21 June 1988 in Singapore and raised in [Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia](/wiki/Kuala_Lumpur,_Malaysia). He attended Sri Inai School in Kuala Lumpur from 1996 to 2001 before returning to Singapore to do his national service as a firefighter. Imam is the son of Singaporean actress *Mariana Yati* and grandson of Biduanita [Nona Asiah](/wiki/Nona_Asiah). ## Career Imam started acting in Singapore as a calefare in *Mengejar Mentari S2* (2015), before gaining attention with his main role in the drama series *S.O.S* and *Firasat (Premonition)* (2014). He was later crowned the Most Popular Male Personality in [Pesta Perdana](/wiki/Pesta_Perdana) (2015), beating Syarif [Sleeq](/wiki/Sleeq) and Hisyam Hamid for the award. Imam moved to Malaysia and began his acting career and was chosen to play the character Shafiq in one of Siti Rosmizah Semail's highly anticipated novels adaption titled *Lafazkan Kalimah Cintamu* in 2018. On March 25, 2020, Imam starred alongside actress and longtime friend Hannah Delisha in the action drama *SAGA 2.0* In 2025, Imam played the role of Amirul Rafiq, under the direction of Feroz Kader through a drama adaptation of the novel by Siti Rosmizah Semail titled *Dia Imamku* alongside [Kamal Adli](/wiki/Kamal_Adli) and [Siti Saleha](/wiki/Siti_Saleha). ## Personal life Imam obtained Malaysian permanent resident status and immigrated to Malaysia in 2017. A year later, Imam and Hannah Delisha got engaged and later married in a private wedding ceremony at [The Fullerton Hotel Singapore](/wiki/The_Fullerton_Hotel_Singapore) on 18 February 2021. ## Filmography ### Drama YearTitleRoleTV ChannelNote2013*Refleksi S1*Zahid[Mediacorp Suria](/wiki/Mediacorp_Suria)First drama*Mengejar Mentari*James*SOS*Sufyan2014*Refleksi S2*Shahrul[Mediacorp Suria](/wiki/Mediacorp_Suria)*Firasat 1*Shahid*The Chalet*Boi KetatDVD2015*SAGA*Zachary Borhan[Mediacorp Suria](/wiki/Mediacorp_Suria)*31 Disember*Azam2016*JB Pailang*Chen LangFilmNot published2017*Firasat 2*Shahid[Mediacorp Suria](/wiki/Mediacorp_Suria)*Faculty*DanielMediacorp Saluran 5Pinggan Tak Retak, Nasi Tak DinginZul Helmi[TV3](/wiki/TV3_(Malaysian_TV_network))2018*Lafazkan Kalimah Cintamu*Shafiq[Astro Ria](/wiki/Astro_Ria)Siti Rosmizah Semail*Oppa, I Love You*Reza[TV1](/wiki/TV1_(Malaysian_TV_network))*Rintihan Hati*Eddy/ Fazli[Mediacorp Suria](/wiki/Mediacorp_Suria)2019*SAGA 2.0*Zachary Borhan[Mediacorp Suria](/wiki/Mediacorp_Suria)New York Film Festival2021*Kisah Rumah Tangga*Iman[Astro Ria](/wiki/Astro_Ria)2024*Makan Inc.*Ashraf[Mediacorp Suria](/wiki/Mediacorp_Suria)2025*Dia Imamku*Amirul Rafiq[Astro Ria](/wiki/Astro_Ria)Works by Siti Rosmizah Semail - Imam Shah at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier))
